thread.title: Susanne

author: Susanne
title: Susanne
text: I have travelled to three countries in South America with Intrepid and recommend them highly. As a single traveller, the companionship of a well - trained local guide and small group have been invaluable in enhancing my travel experience. The opportunity to share a room is also a useful option for single travellers. Intrepid specializes in cultural experiences with the locals, which is a very enriching addition to the tour and gives an opportunity to learn about their culture first-hand. This also gives an income to local communities who benefit as well as the tourists. The Intrepid tour guides have been great: friendly, knowledgeable and patient in helping with any problems. The staff at the Melbourne headquarters are also fantastic to deal with and very efficient. I have no hesitation in recommending Intrepid Travel.
